properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 4 at 3:33AM CST until February 5 at 12:00AM CST by NWS St Louis MO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one
inch. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph.

* WHERE...Shelby MO and Marion MO Counties.

* WHEN...From noon today to midnight CST tonight.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the commute this evening.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of
accumulating snow will primarily cause travel difficulties. Roads
may rapidly become slippery once the snow begins, so motorists
should plan for a slower than normal trip. Be especially alert
when approaching bridges, overpasses, and curves.

The latest road conditions can be obtained on the Internet at
traveler.modot.org/map/ or by calling 1-888-275-6636.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT
